programme.title: Kennedy's brief triumph
programme.short_synopsis: Landslide win for Kennedy in New York primary.
programme.medium_synopsis: Surprise at Senator Kennedy's landslide win at the New York Democrat primary.
programme.long_synopsis:
Surprise at Senator Kennedy's landslide win at the New York Democrat primary.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
